channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 在欧洲开始新的一天需要知道的五件事
item.description: Five things you need to know to start your day in Europe trib.al/PFBzcMc

item.title: 行业领袖的求助，TikTok 面临正式调查，冯德莱恩寻求连任 等，尽在布鲁塞尔版
item.description: Industry leaders' cry for help, TikTok faces a formal probe, von der Leyen seeks a second term Those and more in the Brussels Edition trib.al/vE5ywM2

item.title: 中国股票交易者在结束一周长假返回后增加了保证金贷款，结束了数周的去杠杆化，这是市场情绪正在好转的一个潜在迹象
item.description: China stock traders boosted margin loans as they returned from the week-long holiday, ending weeks of deleveraging in a potential sign that sentiment is on the mend trib.al/s9QPtz7

item.title: 日本一位市长如何帮助扭转当地出生率下降的局面
item.description: How a mayor in Japan helped to turn around declining local birth rates trib.al/5dD3Yu6

item.title: 大型工业公司的负责人希望欧盟降低能源成本和绿色规则的监管负担，以帮助该地区在能源转型加速的过程中保持竞争力
item.description: The heads of major industrial companies want the EU to cut energy costs and the regulatory burden of green rules to help the region stay competitive as the energy transition accelerates trib.al/1w2G5YB

item.title: 罗马尼亚可能需要到本世纪末才能将预算赤字降至欧盟规定的目标，因为政府要在选举年应对公众对财政紧缩的抵触情绪
item.description: Romania may need until the end of the decade to bring its budget deficit down to a target set by EU rules as the government contends with public resistance to fiscal restraint in an election year trib.al/WG6mY2N

item.title: 从削减商业税到填补技能缺口的措施，以下是英国企业对下月预算的最大要求
item.description: From a cut in business taxes to measures to plug skills gap, here are the top requests UK firms have from next month's budget trib.al/KfmMTEv

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯证券交易所运营者称，外国投资者错失了优于大多数新兴市场同行的回报率
item.description: The operator of Saudi Arabia’s stock exchange says foreign investors are missing out on returns that have beaten most emerging-market peers trib.al/iYzLtA5

item.title: 纳瓦尔尼之死表明，俄罗斯经济为入侵乌克兰付出的代价还不足以建立威慑力，@johnauthers 说。
item.description: Navalny's death shows that the price paid by Russia's economy over the invasion of Ukraine hasn't been enough to establish deterrence, says @johnauthers trib.al/bEhgKYt

item.title: "汽车界的空中客车 "正在酝酿之中，以帮助欧洲汽车制造商与中国竞争，抵御生存威胁
item.description: An "Airbus of autos" is being floated to help Europe’s carmakers compete with China and fend off existential threats trib.al/rIEyyOu

item.title: RT by @markets：国际航空运输协会（International Air Transport Association）总干事威利-沃尔什（Willie Walsh）表示，中国商飞 C919 在新加坡航展上的展出 "令人激动"，但 "要想成为可信的全球参与者还需要一些时间"。
item.description: While it is “very exciting” to see China’s Comac C919 on display at the Singapore airshow, “it will take some time to establish themselves as a credible global player,” Willie Walsh, the director general of the International Air Transport Association says trib.al/xbK8O4X

item.title: 据知情人士透露，银盛正在考虑在浮式生产、储存和卸载装置业务首次公开募股之前，为该业务筹集约 10 亿美元的资金。
item.description: Yinson is considering raising about $1 billion in a funding round for its floating production, storage and offloading unit before an IPO of the business, sources say. trib.al/OA5X7pF

item.title: 对中国的担忧加剧，铁矿石跌至三个月低点
item.description: Iron Ore Slumps to Three-Month Low as China Concerns Escalate trib.al/oH7aXXd

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，标准普尔全球公司（S&P Global）即将达成一项交易，以超过 5 亿美元的价格从包括高盛在内的投资银行财团手中收购研究平台 Visible Alpha。
item.description: S&P Global is close to a deal to buy research platform Visible Alpha for more than $500 million from a consortium of investment banks including Goldman, FT reports trib.al/cVlUTeC

item.title: 从食品罐头到电路板，中国的锡供应量正稳步收紧
item.description: China’s supply of tin, the metal used in everything from food cans to circuit boards, is steadily tightening trib.al/fwDmNuP

item.title: 据《南华早报》报道，北京负责香港事务的最高官员将于本周前往香港金融中心，就拟议中的国内安全法征求意见。
item.description: Beijing’s top official in charge of Hong Kong will travel to the financial hub this week to solicit views on a proposed domestic security law, the South China Morning Post reported trib.al/u6ELijS

item.title: 澳大利亚央行在今年的首次会议上考虑提高利率，但最终决定 "更有理由维持现状"。
item.description: Australia’s central bank considered raising interest rates at its first meeting of the year but decided the case to stand pat was the “stronger one” trib.al/qJDqK6Y

item.title: 中国证券监管机构表示，将听取市场参与者的所有建议，甚至是批评意见，这是中国证券监管机构在努力支撑 8.6 万亿美元股票市场过程中罕见的姿态。
item.description: China’s securities regulator said it will take heed of all suggestions, even criticism, from market participants in a rare gesture as it tries to shore up the $8.6 trillion stock market trib.al/3abYIMp

item.title: 中国海岸警卫队登上了一艘在近海前哨附近作业的台湾旅游船，这显然是对造成两名渔民死亡事故的回应
item.description: China’s Coast Guard boarded a Taiwanese tourist vessel operating near an offshore outpost, in an apparent response to an accident that saw two fishermen die trib.al/fdmS2gC

item.title: 由于投资损失和赎回，西蒙-赛德勒的 Segantii 资本管理公司的对冲基金资产自 3 月以来缩水了 18
item.description: Simon Sadler’s Segantii Capital Management saw its hedge fund assets shrink by 18% since March amid investment losses and redemptions trib.al/UB8Vruo

item.title: 中国各家银行下调了关键的抵押贷款参考利率，降幅创下历史之最，加大了对陷入困境的房地产行业的支持力度
item.description: Chinese banks cut a key reference lending rate for mortgages by the most on record, ramping up support for the beleaguered property sector trib.al/O36dskW

item.title: 近 1,500 万桶俄罗斯原油将运往印度，但这些原油却被装载在油轮上，闲置在马来西亚和韩国的海岸边
item.description: Nearly 15 million barrels of Russian crude meant for delivery to India are sitting on tankers idling off the coasts of Malaysia and South Korea trib.al/KXmGSma

item.title: 研究人员说，非洲妇女已经是最容易感染艾滋病毒的群体之一，随着整个非洲大陆干旱的加剧，她们面临的风险越来越大
item.description: African women, already among the most vulnerable in acquiring HIV, are increasingly at risk as droughts intensify across the continent, researchers say trib.al/MsUYoPk

item.title:
有两家银行与历史悠久的罗斯柴尔德家族同名，它们为争夺权力、声望和最有利可图的百万富翁客户而愈演愈烈。
与两家银行关系密切的人士表示，合并可能是唯一的出路。
阅读大事件 ⬇️
item.description:
Two banks share the historic Rothschild family name, and they're increasingly fighting over power, prestige and the most lucrative millionaire clients.

Those close to the firms say a merger may be the only way forward.

Read The Big Take ⬇️ trib.al/SrtLCq2

item.title: 美国银行称，未来两年印度的筹资活动将空前强劲
item.description: Fundraising activity in India will be stronger than ever over the next two years, Bank of America says trib.al/jl50kxy

item.title: 菲律宾大亨曼努埃尔-潘吉里南（Manuel Pangilinan）认为，菲律宾应该拥有更大的矿山，以鼓励对下游行业的投资。
item.description: The Philippines should have bigger mines to encourage investment in the downstream sector, according to tycoon Manuel Pangilinan trib.al/P1v4IlJ

item.title: 一项新的调查显示，十分之六的新加坡公民和居民认为，政府最新的预算措施不足以帮助他们应对不断上涨的生活成本。
item.description: Six in 10 Singapore citizens and residents think that the government’s latest budget measures aren’t enough to help them cope with the rising cost of living, according to a new survey trib.al/Y6vNuzE

item.title: 减肥药越来越受欢迎，意味着食品公司需要改变其商业模式，否则就有可能疏远投资者
item.description: The growing popularity of weight-loss drugs means food companies need to modify their business models or risk alienating investors trib.al/7rUKWx8

item.title: Capital One 同意以 350 亿美元的全股票交易收购信用卡贷款机构 Discover Financial Services，从而成为美国贷款额最大的信用卡公司。
item.description: Capital One agreed to buy credit-card lender Discover Financial Services in a $35 billion all-stock deal to create the largest US credit card company by loan volume trib.al/7AqPgku

item.title: 拜登政府正在全球范围内寻找关键金属储备，为其绿色革命提供动力，但美国唯一的大型钴矿却处于停产状态。为什么？
item.description: The Biden administration is scouring the planet for reserves of critical metals to power its green revolution, but the only major cobalt mine in the US is mothballed. Why? trib.al/7HupO5n
